name: Colonial Village Meat Market, Inc., Appellant, v. Facciolo
name_abbreviation: Colonial Village Meat Market, Inc. v. Facciolo

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
parties: Colonial Village Meat Market, Inc., Appellant, v. Facciolo.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Lawrence Goldberg, with him Robert II. Dickman, and Goldberg & Frankel, for appellant.
Melvin G. Levy, with him Stephen J. Polaha, and Levy and Levy, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Colonial Village Meat Market, Inc., Appellant, v. Facciolo.
Argued September 25, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Lawrence Goldberg, with him Robert II. Dickman, and Goldberg & Frankel, for appellant.
Melvin G. Levy, with him Stephen J. Polaha, and Levy and Levy, for appellees.
August 30, 1974:
